1.text: I did some digging. Your man was jealous with your friend?

3.text: Before, I didn't know why he was distancing himself from me

4.text: He only did it because he thinks that he's not enough for me

5.text: and that I'd be better with someone else

6.text: What's your relationship with him now?

8.text: Every day, he just gets farther and farther away from me
